In a quiet meadow, a curious bunny named Thistle stumbled upon a shimmering pocket watch half-buried in the grass. As she nudged it with her nose, the watch sprang to life, revealing a swirling portal. With a twitch of her whiskers, Thistle hopped through and found herself in ancient Egypt, where she dodged pyramids and befriended a young pharaoh. Together, they discovered a hidden treasure beneath the Sphinx. Each leap through time brought new adventuresâ€”medieval feasts, Victorian gardens, and futuristic cities. With each return, Thistle brought back stories and treasures, proving that even the smallest creatures can leave a big mark on history.
